I currently don't have a real-time update mechanism to check the name changes immediately. To get the latest information, I'd need to refresh the playlist details from Spotify again. Would you like me to do that now?

so you have real time update

You caught me! Indeed, fetching the latest data allowed us to get the updated name of your playlist. Every time I query the data, it gives us the most current information available from Spotify. So, in a way, you can say we do have "real-time" updates depending on when the request is made.
